title: Amazon's early Prime Day Apple Watch sale drives prices down to as low as $169
description: Savings of up to $100 off are in effect on a large selection of Apple Watch Series 10 and SE 2 styles during this weekend's early Prime Day sale.Save up to $100 on Apple Watch styles.Save up to $100: Early Prime Day Apple Watch deals have dropped prices to as low as $169 at Amazon.The weekend price drops include a selection of Apple Watch Series 10, Ultra 2, and SE 2 models, with various case sizes and band styles eligible for double-digit and triple-digit savings. You can jump directly to Amazon's sale page or peruse highlights from the sale below and in our Apple Watch Price Guide. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: Savings of up to $100 off are in effect on a large selection of Apple Watch Series 10 and SE 2 styles during this weekend's early Prime Day sale.
text: Savings of up to $100 off are in effect on a large selection of Apple Watch Series 10 and SE 2 styles during this weekend's early Prime Day sale. The weekend price drops include a selection of Apple Watch Series 10, Ultra 2, and SE 2 models, with various case sizes and band styles eligible for double-digit and triple-digit savings. html:
Savings of up to $100 off are in effect on a large selection of Apple Watch Series 10 and SE 2 styles during this weekend's early Prime Day sale.

Save up to $100: Early Prime Day Apple Watch deals have dropped prices to as low as $169 at Amazon.

The weekend price drops include a selection of Apple Watch Series 10, Ultra 2, and SE 2 models, with various case sizes and band styles eligible for double-digit and triple-digit savings. You can jump directly to Amazon's sale page or peruse highlights from the sale below and in our Apple Watch Price Guide.

Apple Watch deals

  • SE 2 GPS with 40mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $169 ($80 off)
  • SE 2 GPS with 44mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $199 ($80 off)
  • Series 10 GPS with 42mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $299 ($100 off)
  • Series 10 GPS with 46mm Aluminum Case (select colors): $329 ($100 off)
  • Ultra 2 with Black Titanium Case (select bands): $741.89 ($58 off)

Even more Apple savings

There are plenty of additional markdowns to snap up alongside the Apple Watch specials. Below is a sampling of month-end savings on Apple hardware, with hundreds of items on sale in our Apple Price Guide.

  • Countdown to Prime Day 2025: Save up to $400 on Apple right now
  • Samsung announces 2025 monitors with preorder discounts of up to $300 off
  • Grab M4 Mac mini 512GB for $699, save up to $900 across the line
  • Grab Apple's 1TB M4 MacBook Pro for $1,599, a $200 discount
